Text: je chele take maye ta valo basto cheletar puro dhoron gothon buro choda buro choda.
pakka khanir chele....rendir beta....bessar beta.suor mukho take eto gulo maye valobaslo ki kore
ki ruchi. ma baba thekeo jeno mara geche. just 9th e pore hardly 15 16 hobe. r ei age i b.a
akta baje cheler jonyo nijar life ta sesh kora dilo...baje chele akta..
